nodes.text: SAGRecreation was a section of the Commission for the Preservation of the New Order's Sub-Adult Group that was responsible for creating wholesome activities to entertain its members. It was responsible for the creation of wegsphere, a competitive sport whose popularity spread to thousands of planets. Some branches of the division were filled with members who hoped to pursue a career in CompForce; they engaged in wargames and physical training as preparation for military training. Rumors abounded that some exercises were conducted with live blasters with the stunsafes removed.
